name: Risk Go! Back
description:
Risk Go! Back is a puzzle-plataform game, derived from RGB, thus has the colors red, green and blue at the same time has the meaning of risk situations, chance to back and go. It incorporated into the game mechanics a concept of physics in quantum chromodynamics called color charge, where each color charge has its anticolor, which annihilates you. The anticolor appears in the upper right corner of the HUD.

Controls: Character Movements: Keyboard: Move = Left and right keys or AD keys Jump = up key Xbox controler: Move = dpad or left analog Jump = A
